Biology_tweet_58_r$Biology_160_p$Biology.text:
Finding A: A paper @username looks at APC\'s tumor suppressor role in colonic crypts in light of the tissue architecture #OA
Finding B: Animals with complete spinal cord injury performed more than 1000 successive steps without failure, and were able to climb staircases of various heights and lengths with precision and fluidity.
Finding C: It\'s the weather of the seasons on either side of winter that seem to have the biggest impact on long-tailed tit survival.
Finding D: The higher the warming level is, the larger is the increase of burned area, ranging from~40% to~100% across the scenarios.

Finding D: The higher the warming level is, the larger is the increase of burned area, ranging from~40% to~100% across the scenarios.

Biology_tweet_144_r$Biology_tweet_3_p$Bi.text:
Finding A: "The past decade has been the most productive period for marine species discovery", but 1/3 of total still left to find
Finding B: Findings from this study indicated that school-age children were almost twice as sensitive to the melatonin suppression effects of evening moderate bright light exposure (~580 lux) than their parents .
Finding C: Bifidobacteria were found to be established (High-Bif qPCR ) earlier in secretorfed infants (60% of infants versus 37.5% at day 6) and more often (80% versus 50% by day 120) ( Figure 5 ).
Finding D: "It suggests that over the decades to come, lianas could increasingly suppress the ability of tropical forests to sequester carbon."

Finding A: #wood #construction rather than steel/concrete means lower CO2 #emissions & fossil fuel consumption
Finding B: We also discovered that, although circulating 25(OH)D has many systemic effects (1), a critical mechanism for vitamin D signaling to inhibit BCa progression is a tumor autonomous activity that suppresses Id1 expression.
Finding C: Moreover, we were able to quantify and show the magnitude of infrastructure at risk across the circumpolar permafrost domain.
Finding D: Consumption of instant noodles once per week was also associated with a higher prevalence of metabolic syndrome in women (OR: 1.26; 95% CI: 1.06, 1.50) but not in men.

Biology_417_p$Biology_493_r$Biology_2_p$.text:
Finding A: While we demonstrate that amphibian communities are sensitive to changes in climate, our results suggest that changing climate is not the proximate cause for ongoing assemblage-wide declines that have been observed in North American amphibians.
Finding B: "So what we think is happening is knocking down FoxP2 makes the male incapable of reducing song variability in the presence of a female," Murugan said.
Finding C: Our study indicates an important role of H 2 S in protecting against the aging cardiovascular disease.
Finding D: "We found adolescents were not more or less likely to engage in aggressive or prosocial behaviours as a function of the amount of time they devoted to playing violent games," they report.
Biology_417_p$Biology_493_r$Biology_2_p$.displayed_text:
Finding A: While we demonstrate that amphibian communities are sensitive to changes in climate, our results suggest that changing climate is not the proximate cause for ongoing assemblage-wide declines that have been observed in North American amphibians.
Finding B: "So what we think is happening is knocking down FoxP2 makes the male incapable of reducing song variability in the presence of a female," Murugan said.
Finding C: Our study indicates an important role of H 2 S in protecting against the aging cardiovascular disease.
Finding D: "We found adolescents were not more or less likely to engage in aggressive or prosocial behaviours as a function of the amount of time they devoted to playing violent games," they report.

Finding A: Decreased forest regeneration over the last 15 years suggests forests are in a precarious position
Finding B: "We observed delayed onset of motor neuron dysfunction; we noted also that SMN2 mis-splicing increases during the late stages of SMA, likely accelerating its progression in the body.

Biology_430_r$Biology_406_r$Biology_twee.text:
Finding A: "We can tell that there is something going through the filefish diet that\'s making the fish smell enough like the coral to confuse the crabs," Booker said.
Finding B: Body nutrient content and trophic position explained little of the variation in EN, EP, or ENP, indicating limited applicability of basic predictors of EST.
Finding C: We also demonstrate a two-qubit holonomic gate to show universality by manipulating the electron−nucleus entanglement.
Finding D: Our findings provide evidence that temperate marine reserves can deliver fisheries and conservation benefits, and highlight the importance of investigating multispecies interactions, as the recovery of some species can have knock-on effects on others.

Biology_tweet_197_r$Biology_tweet_53_r$B.text:
Finding A: Metarrestin, an inhibitor of tumor metastasis, discovered thru team science @ KU, @username, @username, and @username and more. Congrats to first author Kevin Frankowski and special thanks to Udo Rudloff, Juan Maruguan, and Sui Huang.
Finding B: Nice new paper in @username from Sabine Petry\'s lab: synergy in #microtubule nucleation in XMAP215 and g-TURC
Finding C: The study thus provides a foundation for a new class of self-propelled, batch-fabricable, soft biological swimming machines.
Finding D: Previously, more species in the tropics led to the assumption that temperate, migratory species are derived from tropical, nonmigratory ancestors; however, the results of our phylogenetic study suggest that the opposite pattern happened often in this group."
Biology_tweet_197_r$Biology_tweet_53_r$B.displayed_text:
Finding A: Metarrestin, an inhibitor of tumor metastasis, discovered thru team science @ KU, @username, @username, and @username and more. Congrats to first author Kevin Frankowski and special thanks to Udo Rudloff, Juan Maruguan, and Sui Huang.
Finding B: Nice new paper in @username from Sabine Petry\'s lab: synergy in #microtubule nucleation in XMAP215 and g-TURC
Finding C: The study thus provides a foundation for a new class of self-propelled, batch-fabricable, soft biological swimming machines.
Finding D: Previously, more species in the tropics led to the assumption that temperate, migratory species are derived from tropical, nonmigratory ancestors; however, the results of our phylogenetic study suggest that the opposite pattern happened often in this group."

Biology_433_r$Biology_tweet_14_p$Biology.text:
Finding A: The damage caused by the heatwave affected the sons of overheated males.
Finding B: If these results are confirmed in other scenarios, it follows that the use of overhead low-level far-UVC light in public locations may represent a safe and efficient methodology for limiting the transmission and spread of airborne-mediated microbial diseases such as influenza and tuberculosis.
Finding C: The study found that, on average, Bifidobacterium were established earlier and more frequently in infants fed by women with an active copy of the gene, the secretors, than without one, the non-secretors.
Finding D: "While bacteria make this iron-scavenging compound for their own use, our research suggests that mammals--including humans--have learned over time to hijack it for their own benefit," said Han.
